heading: //TODO:  ToddlerToDo
text: A sample project showcasing a TODO application designed for toddlers. The aim is to offer a colorful and engaging user interface that helps toddlers stay on track with their routines. Every parent knows the challenges of maintaining consistent wake-up and bedtime routines!
